content.metaKeywords: studio equipment, grip equipment, equipment rental, vehicle rental, lighting equipment, lighting rental, entertainment services, turn-key services
content.metaDescriptions: Hertz Entertainment Services and Cinelease are available 24/7 and ready to help.  Give us a call, email us or contact us directly via the website and we'll begin personalizing a package to fit your needs.
content.pageTitle: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us/jcr:content/pageTitle@value">Contact Us - Equipment, Vehicle and Lighting Rentals</dcs:content>
content.generalInfo: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us/jcr:content/generalInfo@value">Hertz Entertainment Services and Cinelease are dedicated to providing our customers with a superior level of service. Please see below for the ways in which we can assist you.</dcs:content>
content.emailInfo: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us/jcr:content/emailInfo@value">We value your feedback and want to hear from you. To let us know how we can help you, or to ask a specific question, select a subject from the pull-down menu and just fill in the fields below.</dcs:content>
content.subject: <dcs:content target="/content/dcs/hes/US/enUS/contact_us/jcr:content/subject@value">Subject</dcs:content>
